VirtualHost:
ServerName xxx.xxx.de
ServerAdmin webmaster@localhost DocumentRoot /var/www/THS/THSupervision/
#LogLevel info ssl:warn
ErrorLog ${APACHE_LOG_DIR}/error.log CustomLog ${APACHE_LOG_DIR}/access.log combined
WSGIDaemonProcess THS processes=2 threads=15 display-name=%{GROUP} python-path=/var/www/THS/THSupervision python-home=/var/www/THS/venv/libs/python3.4 WSGIProcessGroup THS WSGIScriptAlias / /var/www/THS/THSupervision/THSupervision/wsgi.py
Alias /static /var/www/THS/THSupervision/supervision/static
Require all granted
# Next, add the following directory block
Require all granted
